Hit for the cycle against Atlanta on 6/4/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/9/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $7,832,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/1/1988...
Injured on 6/13/1988 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Atlanta to Detroit on 4/26/1989 (Going to ATL: C Matt Nokes, 1B Will Clark. Going to DET: P Tom Glavine, P Chris Hammond, C Jerry Willard, LF Glenn Wilson, 1B Larry Sheets)...
Injured on 4/8/1990 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 3/3/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $7,342,500 per year...
Released by Detroit on 3/4/1991...
